name: Falling Star (Broskibble, JackOatley)
description:
Controls - AD/LEFT-RIGHT to move, Space to shoot, Mouse to select buttons.

Shoot down the small aliens before another Mother Ship comes in! get through as many waves as you can and get the best highscore!

Alternate link to play that also works: https://broskibble.github.io/Falling-Star/

Programming by Broskibble,

Art by Jack Oatley,

Music and SFX by Blue.Nocturne.
